effect.scarlet_violet: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.the_teal_mask: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.the_indigo_disk: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
effect.legends_za: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.
short_effect.legends_za: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
